item.title: This is the second time in a week that i have been unfortunate enough to hit a very large deep pothole., 27th January
item.description:

item.title: Road incident debris left in road, 27th January
item.description:
There has been a crash outside 222 Westwood Lane, causing a lot of debris to be left in the road. One of the drivers moved larger pieces into the kerb, but all the cars driving by are now driving over bits of debris, which could easily splinter up and injure someone.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Westwood Lane, Blackfen, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Ongoing excrements left on communal stairs of the building, 27th January
item.description:
I am writing to formally complain about an ongoing and serious problem in the communal stairwell of our building. There is frequently human excrement left on the stairs and landings. This has happened many times, not just once, and creates extremely unhygienic and unsafe conditions for residents. In addition, I often see drug users gathering in this area, which makes the building feel unsafe and unpleasant to use. This situation poses a health risk and seriously affects the quality of life of people living here. The communal areas should be kept clean and secure, and this problem clearly requires urgent attention. I kindly ask the council to investigate this matter and take appropriate action, such as increased cleaning, security checks, and measures to prevent unauthorised access. Thank you for your attention to this serious issue.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tiverton Street, Elephant and Castle, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street light column might fall down soon., 27th January
item.description:
The street light column was damaged, it might fall down soon. It is very dangerous for our health and safety. I request you as a council to fix asap. Location infront of house number: 87 Kent House Lane Thank you very much.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kent House Lane, New Beckenham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Missing Double yellow lines, 27th January
item.description:
Double yellow lines at top of Dunoon road are warn away. Cars and vans stop on them during the day and at night. This reduces visibility for cars exiting Dunoon road and for pedestrians crossing. Dangerous so close to a school for children. It also makes the road entrance narrow.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dunoon Road, Forest Hill, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Yet another flytip, 27th January
item.description:
The corner of Beddington Road and Beddington Green has been used as a flytip for several years. It must be the same resident/residents that are to blame. Please escalate to area manager as the cost to the council and tax payers for reports made the past few years must exceed thousands. A warning sign on the tree with an anon number to report flytippers may help deter along with a letter to all local residents. It makes our road look terrible and really needs action please.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Beddington Road, St Paul's Cray, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Service box rusting away - dangerous for children and animals., 27th January
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Leeson Road, Brixton, Greater London

item.title: Number of potholes on mount pleasant, 27th January
item.description:
There are a number of reasonable sized potholes along mount pleasant. They are very difficult to avoid due to cars parked on both size and are getting bigger as the road is crumbling.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mount Pleasant, East Barnet, Greater London
